title: Ren-Gnar Skin
body:
Where i found this comment: http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/champions-skins/skin-release/eternum-reksai-ravages-new-world

"OMG WHAT IF THEY MADE A REN-GNAR SKIN FOR GNAR. LITTLE GNAR IS A KITTEN, AND MEGA IS RENGAR"
 supershooba  - about a month ago

This also ties into Gnar's lore as he meets Rengar.
{{champion:150}} {{champion:107}} 

Pls rito.

replies.body: That would be funny. However if it looked too much like another chamion, I dont think they would do it.

For some reason this just made me imagine Rengar like adopting Gnar as his son and trying to teach him to be a hunter but he would like try to play with what he was supposed to be killing and Rengar would be all like "ehhh why do I even try"
